cards.question: 爱不释手
meaning: to love sth too much to part with it (idiom); to fondle admiringly

cards.question: 安居乐业
meaning: live in peace and work happily (idiom)

cards.question: 熬
meaning: to cook on a slow fire

cards.question: 拔苗助长
meaning: to spoil things through excessive enthusiasm (idiom)

cards.question: 霸道
meaning: evil as opposed to the Way of the King 王道

cards.question: 拜年
meaning: wish sb a Happy New Year

cards.question: 拜托
meaning: to request sb to do sth

cards.question: 半途而废
meaning: to give up halfway (idiom); leave sth unfinished

cards.question: 保养
meaning: to take good care of (or conserve) one's health

cards.question: 奔波
meaning: to be constantly on the move

cards.question: 鞭策
meaning: to encourage sb (e.g. to make progress)

cards.question: 扁
meaning: (old form of character 匾, horizontal tablet with inscription)

cards.question: 辩解
meaning: to defend (a point of view etc)

cards.question: 辫子
meaning: a mistake or shortcoming that may be exploited by an opponent

cards.question: 标本
meaning: the root cause and symptoms of a disease

cards.question: 别致
meaning: variant of 別緻|别致[bié zhì]

cards.question: 并存
meaning: to exist at the same time

cards.question: 伯母
meaning: (polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)

cards.question: 不得已
meaning: to have no alternative but to

cards.question: 不敢当
meaning: lit. I dare not (accept the honor); fig. I don't deserve your praise

cards.question: 舱
meaning: the hold of a ship or airplane

cards.question: 倡导
meaning: to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)

cards.question: 沉淀
meaning: to precipitate (solid sediment out of a solution)

cards.question: 称心如意
meaning: after one's heart (idiom); gratifying and satisfactory

cards.question: 盛
meaning: to pick up with a utensil

cards.question: 赤道
meaning: equator (of the earth or astronomical body)

cards.question: 重叠
meaning: reduplication (in Chinese grammar, e.g. 散散步 to have a stroll)

cards.question: 抽空
meaning: to find the time to do sth

cards.question: 出路
meaning: a way out (of a difficulty etc)

cards.question: 出洋相
meaning: to make a fool of oneself

cards.question: 川流不息
meaning: the stream flows without stopping (idiom); unending flow

cards.question: 串
meaning: to make a swift or abrupt linear movement (like a bead on an abacus)

cards.question: 锤
meaning: weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)

cards.question: 词汇
meaning: list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)

cards.question: 凑合
meaning: to make do in a bad situation

cards.question: 搓
meaning: to rub or roll between the hands or fingers

cards.question: 搭配
meaning: to add sth into a group

cards.question: 打包
meaning: to ask for a doggy bag (at a restaurant)

cards.question: 大伙儿
meaning: erhua variant of 大伙[dà huǒ]

cards.question: 代理
meaning: to act on behalf of sb in a responsible position
to act as an agent or proxy

cards.question: 淡水
meaning: potable water (water with low salt content)

cards.question: 得不偿失
meaning: (saying) the gains do not make up for the losses

cards.question: 东道主
meaning: official host (e.g. venue for games or a conference)

cards.question: 动静
meaning: sound of activity or people talking

cards.question: 兜
meaning: to wrap up or hold in a bag

cards.question: 督促
meaning: to supervise and urge completion of a task

cards.question: 端
meaning: to hold sth level with both hands

cards.question: 端午节
meaning: the Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of the 5th lunar month)

cards.question: 对策
meaning: countermeasure for dealing with a situation

cards.question: 对联
meaning: pair of lines of verse written vertically down the sides of a doorway

cards.question: 对照
meaning: to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)

cards.question: 堕落
meaning: a fall into sin or depravity

cards.question: 法人
meaning: see also 自然人[zì rán rén]

cards.question: 番
meaning: (when used after a verb) times or fold
classifier for the number of iterations of an action or deed etc

cards.question: 反面
meaning: the other side (of a problem etc)

cards.question: 反问
meaning: to answer a question with a question

cards.question: 飞禽走兽
meaning: the beasts of the field and the birds of the air

cards.question: 风暴
meaning: fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)

cards.question: 敷衍
meaning: to do sth half-heartedly or just for show

cards.question: 俯仰
meaning: lowering and raising of the head

cards.question: 副
meaning: abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb

cards.question: 附和
meaning: to copy sb's action or words

cards.question: 高考
meaning: college entrance exam (abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试)
entrance exam for senior government service posts (Taiwan)

cards.question: 稿件
meaning: material contributing to a final document

cards.question: 更新
meaning: to replace the old with new

cards.question: 辜负
meaning: to fail to live up (to expectations)

cards.question: 过瘾
meaning: to get a kick out of sth

cards.question: 和解
meaning: to settle (a dispute out of court)

cards.question: 恨不得
meaning: to wish one could do sth

cards.question: 红包
meaning: lit. money wrapped in red as a gift

cards.question: 吼
meaning: roar or howl of an animal

cards.question: 后顾之忧
meaning: fears of trouble in the rear (idiom); family worries (obstructing freedom of action)

cards.question: 呼吁
meaning: to call on (sb to do sth)

cards.question: 华侨
meaning: (in a restricted sense) Chinese emigrant who still retains Chinese nationality

cards.question: 画蛇添足
meaning: lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous

cards.question: 还原
meaning: to restore to the original state

cards.question: 即将
meaning: to be on the verge of

cards.question: 急于求成
meaning: anxious for quick results (idiom); to demand instant success

cards.question: 寄托
meaning: to have sb look after sb
to entrust the care of sb

cards.question: 继往开来
meaning: to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition
forming a bridge between earlier and later stages

cards.question: 家常
meaning: the daily life of a family

cards.question: 监视
meaning: to keep a close watch over

cards.question: 剪彩
meaning: to cut the ribbon (at a launching or opening ceremony)

cards.question: 简陋
meaning: simple and crude (of a room or building)

cards.question: 简体字
meaning: as opposed to traditional Chinese character 繁體字|繁体字[fán tǐ zì]

cards.question: 见义勇为
meaning: to see what is right and act courageously (idiom, from Analects); to stand up bravely for the truth
acting heroically in a just cause

cards.question: 将军
meaning: to put sb on the spot

cards.question: 较量
meaning: to have a contest with sb

cards.question: 竭尽全力
meaning: to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost

cards.question: 津津有味
meaning: with keen interest pleasure (idiom); with gusto

cards.question: 晋升
meaning: to promote to a higher position

cards.question: 精华
meaning: most important part of an object

cards.question: 精益求精
meaning: to perfect sth that is already outstanding (idiom); constantly improving

cards.question: 颈椎
meaning: the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals

cards.question: 竞选
meaning: to take part in an election

cards.question: 救济
meaning: to help the needy with cash or goods

cards.question: 局限
meaning: to restrict sth within set boundaries

cards.question: 举足轻重
meaning: a foot's move sways the balance (idiom); to hold the balance of power

cards.question: 开采
meaning: to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)

cards.question: 开朗
meaning: to open out (onto a wider vista)

cards.question: 刊登
meaning: to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)

cards.question: 空前绝后
meaning: unprecedented and never to be duplicated

cards.question: 空隙
meaning: gap in time between two events

cards.question: 苦尽甘来
meaning: sweetness begins (idiom); the hard times are over

cards.question: 挎
meaning: to carry (esp. slung over the arm, shoulder or side)

cards.question: 扩张
meaning: to expand (e.g. one's power or influence)

cards.question: 啦
meaning: particle placed after each item in a list of examples

cards.question: 栏目
meaning: regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)

cards.question: 乐意
meaning: to be willing to do sth
to be ready to do sth
to be happy to do sth

cards.question: 理所当然
meaning: as it should be by rights (idiom); proper and to be expected as a matter of course

cards.question: 理直气壮
meaning: in the right and self-confident (idiom); bold and confident with justice on one's side
to have the courage of one's convictions

cards.question: 力所能及
meaning: as far as one's capabilities extend (idiom); to the best of one's ability

cards.question: 联想
meaning: word prediction and auto-complete functions of input method editing programs

cards.question: 灵感
meaning: a burst of creativity in scientific or artistic endeavor

cards.question: 留恋
meaning: to hate to have to go

cards.question: 嘛
meaning: modal particle indicating that sth is obvious
particle indicating a pause for emphasis

cards.question: 慢性
meaning: slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)

cards.question: 枚
meaning: used as a gag for marching soldiers (old)

cards.question: 没辙
meaning: (idiom) unable to solve; no way to escape a problem

cards.question: 弥补
meaning: to make up for a deficiency

cards.question: 弥漫
meaning: variant of 彌漫|弥漫[mí màn]

cards.question: 迷信
meaning: to have a superstitious belief (in sth)

cards.question: 勉强
meaning: to force sb to do sth

cards.question: 名次
meaning: position in a ranking of names

cards.question: 名额
meaning: place (in an institution, a group etc)

cards.question: 莫名其妙
meaning: unable to make head or tail of it

cards.question: 目睹
meaning: to see with one's own eyes

cards.question: 内涵
meaning: essential properties implied or reflected by a notion

cards.question: 浓厚
meaning: to have a strong interest in

cards.question: 哦
meaning: oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)

cards.question: 趴
meaning: resting one's upper body (on a desktop etc)

cards.question: 攀登
meaning: fig. to forge ahead in the face of hardships and danger

cards.question: 捧
meaning: to hold up with both hands

cards.question: 偏偏
meaning: (indicates that sth turns out just the opposite of what one would expect or what would be normal)

cards.question: 漂浮
meaning: to drift (also fig., to lead a wandering life)

cards.question: 拼命
meaning: (to work or fight) as if one's life depends on it

cards.question: 迫不及待
meaning: itching to get on with it

cards.question: 齐心协力
meaning: to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts

cards.question: 启程
meaning: to set out on a journey

cards.question: 启事
meaning: announcement (written, on billboard, letter, newspaper or website)

cards.question: 岂有此理
meaning: how can this be so? (idiom); preposterous

cards.question: 气功
meaning: a system of deep breathing exercises

cards.question: 千方百计
meaning: a hundred plans (idiom); by every possible means

cards.question: 签订
meaning: to agree to and sign (a treaty etc)

cards.question: 潜水
meaning: lurker (Internet slang for sb who reads forum posts but never replies)

cards.question: 锲而不舍
meaning: to chip away at a task and not abandon it (idiom); to chisel away at sth

cards.question: 染
meaning: to add colour washes to a painting

cards.question: 热泪盈眶
meaning: eyes brimming with tears of excitement (idiom)

cards.question: 人道
meaning: one of the stages in the cycle of reincarnation (Buddhism)

cards.question: 任重道远
meaning: a heavy load and a long road
fig. to bear heavy responsibilities through a long struggle (cf Confucian Analects, 8.7)

cards.question: 日新月异
meaning: monthly change (idiom); every day sees new developments

cards.question: 日益
meaning: more and more with each passing day

cards.question: 融洽
meaning: on good terms with one another

cards.question: 啥
meaning: dialectal equivalent of 什麼|什么[shén me]

cards.question: 世代
meaning: passing on from generation to generation

cards.question: 示范
meaning: to show how to do sth

cards.question: 耍
meaning: to display (a skill, one's temper etc)

cards.question: 涮
meaning: to cook by dipping finely sliced ingredients briefly in boiling water or soup (generally done at the dining table)

cards.question: 四肢
meaning: the four limbs of the body

cards.question: 塑造
meaning: to portray (in sculpture or in words)

cards.question: 糖葫芦
meaning: sugar-coated Chinese hawthorn fruit on a stick

cards.question: 特长
meaning: one's special ability or strong points

cards.question: 提拔
meaning: to promote to a higher job

cards.question: 调剂
meaning: to make up a medical prescription

cards.question: 调解
meaning: to bring parties to an agreement

cards.question: 统筹兼顾
meaning: an overall plan taking into account all factors

cards.question: 投掷
meaning: to throw sth a long distance

cards.question: 突破
meaning: to surmount or break the back of (a task etc)
(of ball sports) to break through a defense

cards.question: 哇
meaning: replaces 啊 when following the vowel "u" or "ao"

cards.question: 完备
meaning: to leave nothing to be desired

cards.question: 玩意儿
meaning: erhua variant of 玩意[wán yì]

cards.question: 惋惜
meaning: to feel sorry for a person over sth that should have happened

cards.question: 往常
meaning: as one used to do formerly

cards.question: 为难
meaning: to find things difficult (to do or manage)

cards.question: 窝
meaning: pit or hollow on the human body

cards.question: 诬陷
meaning: to plant false evidence against sb

cards.question: 无从
meaning: sth one has no way of doing

cards.question: 无可奈何
meaning: abbr. to 無奈|无奈[wú nài]

cards.question: 无理取闹
meaning: to make trouble without reason (idiom); to be deliberately provocative

cards.question: 无穷无尽
meaning: vast and limitless (idiom); endless span of time

cards.question: 武侠
meaning: martial arts chivalry (Chinese literary, theatrical and cinema genre)

cards.question: 牺牲
meaning: to do sth at the expense of

cards.question: 喜闻乐见
meaning: a delight to see (idiom); an attractive spectacle

cards.question: 馅儿
meaning: e.g. in 包子 or 饺子[jiǎo zi]

cards.question: 镶嵌
meaning: to set (e.g. a jewel in a ring)

cards.question: 想方设法
meaning: to think up every possible method (idiom); to devise ways and means

cards.question: 兴高采烈
meaning: happy and excited (idiom); in high spirits

cards.question: 兴致勃勃
meaning: to become exhilarated (idiom); in high spirits

cards.question: 须知
meaning: rules that must be known before starting sth

cards.question: 宣扬
meaning: to make public or well known

cards.question: 悬崖峭壁
meaning: sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)

cards.question: 学位
meaning: e.g.: BSc 學士學位|学士学位
MSc 碩士學位|硕士学位
Diploma 學位證書|学位证书
PhD 博士學位|博士学位[bó shì xué wèi]

cards.question: 雪上加霜
meaning: to add hail to snow (idiom); one disaster on top of another
to make things worse in a bad situation

cards.question: 循序渐进
meaning: step by step (idiom); to make steady progress incrementally

cards.question: 压岁钱
meaning: money given to children as new year present

cards.question: 眼神
meaning: expression or emotion showing in one's eyes

cards.question: 咬牙切齿
meaning: gnashing one's teeth (idiom); displaying extreme anger
fuming with rage between gritted teeth

cards.question: 依靠
meaning: to rely on sth (for support etc)

cards.question: 一向
meaning: a period of time in the recent past

cards.question: 以至
meaning: to such an extent as to ... (also written 以至於|以至于)

cards.question: 以致
meaning: to such an extent as to

cards.question: 翼
meaning: area surrounding the bullseye of a target
one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

cards.question: 一举两得
meaning: two gains (idiom); two birds with one stone

cards.question: 一如既往
meaning: just as in the past (idiom); as before

cards.question: 一丝不苟
meaning: not one thread loose (idiom); strictly according to the rules
not one hair out of place

cards.question: 音响
meaning: sound field (in a room or theater)

cards.question: 隐患
meaning: misfortune not visible from the surface

cards.question: 永恒
meaning: fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)

cards.question: 与日俱增
meaning: to grow with each passing day

cards.question: 元宵节
meaning: the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节
on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar

cards.question: 孕育
meaning: to nurture (a development, school of thought, artwork etc)

cards.question: 咋
meaning: dialectal equivalent of 怎麼|怎么[zěn me]

cards.question: 再接再厉
meaning: to continue the struggle (idiom); to persist

cards.question: 赞叹
meaning: to sigh or gasp in admiration

cards.question: 扎
meaning: to run or stick (a needle etc) into
jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)

cards.question: 沾光
meaning: fig. to benefit from association with sb or sth

cards.question: 斩钉截铁
meaning: to chop the nail and slice the iron (idiom); resolute and decisive

cards.question: 折腾
meaning: to toss from side to side (e.g. sleeplessly)
to repeat sth over and over again

cards.question: 斟酌
meaning: to fill up a cup to the brim

cards.question: 争先恐后
meaning: striving to be first and fearing to be last (idiom); outdoing one another

cards.question: 正月
meaning: first month of the lunar year

cards.question: 指定
meaning: to indicate clearly and with certainty

cards.question: 制服
meaning: (in former times) what one is allowed to wear depending on social status

cards.question: 致辞
meaning: to express in words or writing
to make a speech (esp. short introduction, vote of thanks, afterword, funeral homily etc)

cards.question: 终究
meaning: after all is said and done

cards.question: 众所周知
meaning: see 眾所周知|众所周知[zhòng suǒ zhōu zhī]

cards.question: 周转
meaning: to have enough resources to cover a need

cards.question: 主办
meaning: to host (a conference or sports event)

cards.question: 铸造
meaning: to cast (pour metal into a mold)

cards.question: 转折
meaning: shift in the trend of events

cards.question: 琢磨
meaning: to polish and refine a literary work

cards.question: 着手
meaning: to put one's hand to it
to start out on a task

cards.question: 资深
meaning: senior (in terms of depth of accumulated experience)

cards.question: 纵横
meaning: lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal
abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横
School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
